DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate anti-tumor efficacy tadalafil combination Lenalidomide/dexamethasone ( Rd ) multiple myeloma .
DOC.brief_title: Administration Tadalafil Conjunction With Lenalidomide Dexamethasone Patients With Multiple Myeloma
DOC.criteria: Progressive myeloma define International Uniform Criteria . Currently Lenalidomide dexamethasone treatment myeloma Age > 18 year . Measurable paraprotein serum urine detectable free light chain serum . ECOG performance status 0 2 . Hypersensitivity PDE5 inhibitor tadalafil , sildenafil vardenafil . History malignancy multiple myeloma last five year , except adequately treat basal squamous cell skin cancer . Participation clinical trial involve investigational drug device four week prior . Infection require treatment antibiotic , antifungal , antiviral agent last seven day Any evidence severe uncontrolled systemic disease ( e.g. , unstable uncompensated respiratory , cardiac , hepatic , renal disease ) . History significant hypotensive episode require hospitalization . Acute myocardial infarction within prior 3 month , uncontrolled angina Uncontrolled arrhythmia , uncontrolled congestive heart failure History follow cardiac condition : I. Angina require treatment longacting nitrate . II . Angina require treatment shortacting nitrate within 90 day plan tadalafil administration . III . Unstable angina within 90 day visit 1 . IV . Positive cardiac stress test without document evidence subsequent , effective cardiac intervention . History follow coronary condition within 90 day plan tadalafil administration : i. Myocardial Infarction . ii . Coronary artery bypass graft surgery . iii . Percutaneous coronary intervention ( example , angioplasty stent placement ) . iv . Any evidence heart disease ( NYHAâ‰¥Class III ) within 6 month plan tadalafil administration . Current treatment nitrate . Current systemic treatment potent cytochrome P450 3A4 ( CYP3A4 ) inhibitor ketoconazole ritonavir . Prior chronic immune suppressive state ( AIDS , immunosuppressive therapy ) . History hypotension and/or blindness sudden decrease/loss hearing prior treatment PDE5 inhibitor . Prior history nonarterial ischemic optic retinopathy
